pages.title: Binding
pages.text: The Binding Stone is a magical device that can be used to bind elements to items. After binding an element to an item, that item will have the power of that element.

pages.description: The Binding Stone can be crafted with a block of lutetium and some blank gems.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: First, throw the item you want to bind something to on the stone. Then the element identifier. For fire it's Blaze Powder, for water a Water Bucket, for air a Feather and for earth some Crushed Dirt. After the identifier the Binding Stone will tell you what it needs next.
